entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Flurries or snow squalls early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
